title: [BUG][Ticket 3/5] Implement inline editing UI for segment positioning templates

sections.text: Add editable fields for each positioning template section (value props, differentiators, proof points, objections) within the segment detail view, reusing the template payload schema defined in GOLD-4. Implement local form state, dirty tracking, and basic client-side validation (required/length limits) without wiring persistence yet. Ensure the UI can toggle between read and edit modes and preserves server defaults when no custom template exists.
